channel.title: R. A. Souza
channel.description: Otimize a sua presença online - agora!

item.title: slide22
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title]Use custom captions[/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text style="top: 81px; left: 40px; width: 40%;"]Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis eleifend dignissim libero a accumsan. Nullam id accumsan dolor.[/mt_caption_text]

item.title: aboutus1
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title]You can count on Us![/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text]All day everyday We are here for you![/mt_caption_text]

item.title: slide31
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title]Powerful Shortcode Generator[/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text]You can easily create Your awesome page with shortcode generator. All shortcodes are well described and easy to use for beginners[/mt_caption_text]

item.title: slide32
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title]Clean Multipurpose Design[/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text]Theme can be used not only for business sites, but can be also adapted to portfolio or blog website[/mt_caption_text]

item.title: slide33
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title style="opacity: .8; right: 40px; top: 40px;"]Unlimited color variation[/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text style="opacity: .8; right: 40px; top: 83px; width: 40%;"]Change color scheme with just couple clicks. By default there is light and dark color skin and about 25 colorpickers. If that wasn't enought for you you can also add your custom css in theme options[/mt_caption_text]

item.title: slide34
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title style="opacity: .8; right: 40px; top: 40px;"]4 Awesome Sliders[/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text style="opacity: .8; right: 40px; top: 83px; width: 40%;"]You can choose one of 4 awesome sliders: Revolution Slider, Nivo Slider, Flex Slider or Accordion Slider. They can be used as many times as you want and wherever you want[/mt_caption_text]

item.title: slide43
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title]Add Your Own Captions![/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text]Every slide photo can have it's own unique caption.[/mt_caption_text] [mt_caption_title style="right: 40px; bottom: 95px; opacity: .8;"]You can create couple of them![/mt_caption_title] [mt_caption_text style="right: 40px; bottom: 50px; opacity: .8;"]Basically as many as you want. And you can change style of the caption freely[/mt_caption_text]

item.title: accslide1
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title style="right: 40px; top: 40px; opacity: .8;"]Theme is translation ready. You can easily translate it to your own language[/mt_caption_title]

item.title: accslide2
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title style="right: 40px; top: 40px; opacity: .8;"]We offer quick and good support for Our Clients[/mt_caption_title]

item.title: accslide3
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.excerpt:encoded: [mt_caption_title style="right: 40px; top: 40px; opacity: .8;"]Clean and modern fully flexible design[/mt_caption_title]

item.title: NivoSlider
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.content:encoded:
[mt_row] [mt_one_third] NivoSlider is fully responsive slider with couple usefull options. You can use it wherever you want and as many times you want, there is no limits. You can find couple demos below. [mt_lineheader size="4"]Options:[/mt_lineheader]
  • ID: you can choose ID of the slider you want to use
  • width: width of the slider (stays responsive)
  • crop: choose if you want to crop your images to the same height (image won't be cropped if smaller)
  • height: height of the slider images
  • thumbs: choose if you want to show thumbs or standard dots
  • margintop: top margin for your control (thumbs or dots) navigation. You can use here negative values too
  • thumbswidth: thumb width
  • thumbsheight: thumb height
  • thumbsmargin: choose margin between thumbs
  • speed: slideshow speed
  • effect: you can choose you effect here, by default it's random
  • shadowed: if you want to use shadows within the slider you can choose YES here
[/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_nivoslider id="11" width="730" crop="no" height="" thumbs="true" margintop="20" thumbswidth="60" thumbsheight="40" thumbsmargin="0px 3px 6px 3px" speed="50000" effect="random" shadowed="no"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_row] [mt_clear padding="30"] [mt_row] [mt_one_third] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Basic setup[/mt_lineheader] [mt_nivoslider id="7" width="420" crop="yes" height="240" thumbs="false" margintop="20" thumbswidth="60" thumbsheight="40" thumbsmargin="0px 3px 6px 3px" speed="50000" effect="random" shadowed="no"] [/mt_one_third] [mt_one_third] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Shadowed version[/mt_lineheader] [mt_nivoslider id="7" width="420" crop="yes" height="240" thumbs="true" margintop="20" thumbswidth="60" thumbsheight="40" thumbsmargin="0px 4px 8px 4px" speed="50000" effect="random" shadowed="yes"] [/mt_one_third] [mt_one_third_last] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Changed thumbnail size and position[/mt_lineheader] [mt_nivoslider id="7" width="420" crop="yes" height="240" thumbs="true" margintop="0" thumbswidth="40" thumbsheight="40" thumbsmargin="0px -1px -1px 0" speed="50000" effect="random" shadowed="no"] [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_row]

item.title: FlexSlider
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.content:encoded:
[mt_row] [mt_one_third] FlexSlider is fully responsive and lightweight slider plugin. As other sliders there is no limit in using this wherever you need. [mt_lineheader size="4"]Options:[/mt_lineheader]
  • ID: you can choose ID of the slider you want to use
  • width: width of the slider (stays responsive)
  • crop: choose if you want to crop your images to the same height (image won't be cropped if smaller)
  • height: height of the slider images
  • animation: choose fade or slide animation
  • slideshow: choose if you want to use slideshow or not
  • speed: slideshow speed
  • shadowed: if you want to use shadows within the slider you can choose YES here
[/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_flexslider id="11" width="730" crop="no" height="" animation="fade" slideshow="false" speed="5000" shadowed="no"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_row] [mt_clear padding="30"] [mt_row] [mt_one_third] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Basic setup[/mt_lineheader] [mt_flexslider id="7" width="420" crop="yes" height="240" animation="fade" slideshow="false" speed="5000" shadowed="no"] [/mt_one_third] [mt_one_third] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Shadowed version[/mt_lineheader] [mt_flexslider id="7" width="420" crop="yes" height="240" animation="fade" slideshow="false" speed="5000" shadowed="yes"] [/mt_one_third] [mt_one_third_last] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Slide animation[/mt_lineheader] [mt_flexslider id="7" width="420" crop="yes" height="240" animation="slide" slideshow="false" speed="5000" shadowed="no"] [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_row]

item.title: Accordion Slider
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.content:encoded:
[mt_row] [mt_one_third] Accordion Slider is responsive horizontal slider plugin. As other sliders there is no limit in using this wherever you need. One thing that you should know is that it will resize horizontally (only). [mt_lineheader size="4"]Options:[/mt_lineheader]
  • ID: you can choose ID of the slider you want to use
  • width: width of the slider (stays responsive)
  • crop: choose if you want to crop your images to the same height (image won't be cropped if smaller)
  • height: height of the slider images
  • previewwidth: choose width of preview slides (on the right)
  • currentwidth: choose width of current (active) slide
  • animspeed: slideshow speed
  • shadowed: if you want to use shadows within the slider you can choose YES here
[/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_accordionslider id="11" width="640" crop="no" height="300" previewwidth="0.1" currentwidth="0.8" animspeed="5000" shadowed="no"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_row] [mt_clear padding="30"] [mt_row] [mt_one_half] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Shadowed version[/mt_lineheader] [mt_accordionslider id="7" width="500" crop="no" height="320" previewwidth="0.1" currentwidth="0.8" animspeed="5000" shadowed="yes"] [/mt_one_half] [mt_one_half_last] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Changed width and animation speed[/mt_lineheader] [mt_accordionslider id="7" width="500" crop="yes" height="320" previewwidth="0.05" currentwidth="0.9" animspeed="50000" shadowed="no"] [/mt_one_half_last] [/mt_row]

item.title: Revolution Slider
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.content:encoded:
[mt_row] [mt_one_third] Revolution Slider is one of the most powerful premium sliders out there. It's worth $15 and it's added free to this theme with all it's features. There are couple more advanced demos on this site e.g. on homepages. Make sure You checked them out! [mt_lineheader size="4"]Slider features:[/mt_lineheader] [mt_list]
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] Fully responsive slider
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] 2D and 3D transitions
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] Supports images, videos, html and has also couple prepared captions
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] Swipe Touch enabled on mobile devices
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] Options to import/export your slides
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] Easy to use drag&drop backend
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] 20 different slide transition, and unlimited variations due rotation and amount of slots
  • [mt_icon type="ok" size="1em" color="1ABC9C"] Two level animations of captions. Start Time, end time, different animation type and easing at start and end
[/mt_list] [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [rev_slider pageslider1] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_row]

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

item.title: Big Buck Bunny
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.content:encoded:
[mt_section full="no" style="dark" shadow="medium" paddingt="80px" paddingb="80px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="333333" bguseimg="yes" bgimage="http://themesymphony.com/themes/spectro/wp-content/themes/spectro/images/bg/bg43.jpg" bgcover="no" bgpos="left top" bgrep="repeat"] [mt_slogan]

Big Buck Bunny from Blender Foundation

[/mt_slogan] [mt_clear padding="10"] [mt_one_sixth] [mt_clear padding="10"] [/mt_one_sixth] [mt_two_third] [embed]http://vimeo.com/1084537[/embed] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_sixth_last] [mt_clear padding="10"] [/mt_one_sixth_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="80px"] [mt_lineheader size="4"]About the movie[/mt_lineheader] Big Buck Bunny is a comedy about a well-tempered rabbit "Big Buck", who finds his day spoiled by the rude actions of the forest bullies, three rodents. In the typical 1950ies cartoon tradition Big Buck then prepares for the rodents a comical revenge. The creative team for the movie were brought together by the Blender Institute from all over the world, including the USA, Denmark, Italy, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium and Australia. The music has been composed by Jan Morgenstern, who also provided the sound track for the previous Blender production; "Elephant's Dream". Big Buck Bunny will be released on 35mm film format, on DVD and Bluray. The latter will be available by the end of April. Shortly after the DVD release the film will be freely downloadable for everyone in various formats. You can read more at the Project Page [/mt_section]

item.title: Features
item.dc:creator: rasouza
item.content:encoded:
[mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

Responsive design

Spectro comes with responsive and flexible design. From 1140px to 320px. You don't have to worry about your site when it's viewed on tablets or mobile phones. All elements are also retina ready and they look clean and sharp. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/home-responsive2.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-unlimited-colors.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

Unlimited colors

Theme comes with prepared light and dark layout style and over 25 colorpickers. Header and footer sections are fully customizable. With just couple clicks you can change its look totally. And if this isn't enought you can use custom css window to add your own css styles and colors. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

4 awesome sliders

Themes comes with 4 awesome sliders: premium plugin Revolution Slider (value $15) builded in this theme for free, Nivo Slider, Flex Slider and Accordion Slider. All sliders are responsive and can be used wherever you need them. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-4-sliders.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-unlimited-sliders.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

Unlimited sliders

All sliders can be used as many times as you want to, there is no limit. You can use them in page content area, in headers, widgets and posts. All of them can have custom captions that can be used multiple times. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

Powerful page options

There are 8 prepared custom templates that comes with this theme. All of them have their own useful options. Use them to easily change the look and feel of your pages. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-powerful-page-options.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-shortcode-generator.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

Shortcode generator

Over 35 useful shortcodes that can be easily added to your pages and posts with shortcode generator. A lot of options and a lot of possibilities. Build your pages quickly and efficiently. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

Easy-to-use theme options

Advanced admin panel will help you with basic options. Change theme colors, typography, header and footer settings or add your own custom css. All of this with easy-to-use and user-friendly options panel. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-etu-theme-options.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-6-blog-lay.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

6 blog layouts

Choose if you want to use standard blog with left, right or without sidebar. You can also choose 2,3 or 4 columns grid (masonry style) blog layout. Blog supports 6 post formats and every format has it's own options. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

24! portfolio combinations

Yes, that's right.There are 24 different portfolio combinations that you can use to show your projects. You can use between 2, 3 and 4 column layouts, paginated or filtered, standard or masonry type, gallery style or with additional info. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-24-port-lay.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-lightanddark.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

Light and dark layout styles

Theme have builded in light and dark style. In case you wouldn't like them you can easily edit those styles manually, both are divided and are easily customizable. Of course they're easily available from admin panel with just one click. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

Slider manager

All sliders can be created with builded-in slider manager. You can add you captions there and manage their order easily. Uploaded photos can be used in every slider. Other options are available with slider shortcodes. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-slidermanager.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-3cpt.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

3 custom post types

Theme uses custom post types for portfolio items, sliders and team members. All custom post types can be used unlimited times on the post and pages with shortcodes and custom templates. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

Custom page title

Default page title can be set in theme options. Set you own background and font color, pattern or custom image. If you want to add some personality to your pages you can also overwrite default page title settings on your pages and posts. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-custom-page-title.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-translatable.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

Translation ready

Theme is translation ready, that means you can easily translate it to your own language with available mo/po files or you can translate it into multilingual site with plugin like WPML. You can also easily generate code for Google Fonts with character set of your choice. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

Awesome and quick support

I offer quick and reliable support for all my themes. If you have problem with setting theme up, you haven't found answer for your question in documentation or you just found a bug - just create topic on my forum and let me know. External support forum is available for all clients that bought one of my themes. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-support.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px"] [mt_two_third] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-xml.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="ltr"] [/mt_two_third] [mt_one_third_last]

XML demo content included

You'll get XML file with demo content that can easily help you recreate the demo page. All images used in my demo are not available in final version and are replaced by 'dummy' images. If you want to have good starting point for your own site it's definitely something to look up to. [/mt_one_third_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third]

600+ Google Fonts

If you want to use your own custom Google Font you can easily copy link of the font from Google Fonts directory and put it with the name in theme options. You can use any font you want, any weight you want, any style and any character set you want. [/mt_one_third] [mt_two_third_last] [mt_image src="http://www.rasouza.com.br/site2/wp-content/uploads/2013/07/feat-600googlefonts.png" align="center" alt="Photo" animate="yes" animtype="rtl"] [/mt_two_third_last] [/mt_section]

item.dc:creator: rasouza

Big Buck Bunny from Blender Foundation

Duis blandit pulvinar lacus, sed vulputate libero hendrerit ac[/mt_services] [/mt_one_fourth_last] [/mt_section] [mt_section style="dark" paddingt="80px" paddingb="80px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="333"]

About the movie

Big Buck Bunny is a comedy about a well-tempered rabbit "Big Buck", who finds his day spoiled by the rude actions of the forest bullies, three rodents. In the typical 1950ies cartoon tradition Big Buck then prepares for the rodents a comical revenge. The creative team for the movie were brought together by the Blender Institute from all over the world, including the USA, Denmark, Italy, Germany, the Netherlands, Belgium and Australia. The music has been composed by Jan Morgenstern, who also provided the sound track for the previous Blender production; "Elephant's Dream". Big Buck Bunny will be released on 35mm film format, on DVD and Bluray. The latter will be available by the end of April. Shortly after the DVD release the film will be freely downloadable for everyone in various formats. You can read more at the Project Page [/mt_section]

item.title: Maximum Air

item.content:encoded: [mt_section paddingt="80px" paddingb="60px" bgusecolor="yes" bgcolor="fcfcfc" borderusecolor="yes"] [mt_one_third] [mt_lineheader size="4"]Project details[/mt_lineheader] Awesome project created by highly talented Pawel Nolbert While working on my Sneakercube project, I was commissioned by Nike Sportswear Poland to create series of illustrations to promote the release of Nike Air Max Sunset Pack, featuring an orange-to-yellow gradient on an engineered mesh finish with black elements.
